name: zkdemocracy
description: A ready-to-use anonymous voting system based on Semaphore zero-knowledge group management library
author: Laszlo Fazekas <thebojda@gmail.com>

scripts.mysql:start: docker run -p 3306:3306 --rm --name zkdemocracy-mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=12345 -e MYSQL_DATABASE=zkdemocracy -e MYSQL_USER=zkdemocracy -e MYSQL_PASSWORD=12345 -v zkdemocracy_mysql_data:/var/lib/mysql -d mysql:8.4
